name: Sean Thomas
title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
about: My name is Sean Thomas. I graduate with my BS in Business Administration in May of 2026, and intend to continue my studies online.
I founded an IT Consulting firm named Signal Surge LLC.
I am a Sergeant in the Alabama Army National Guard with a Top Secret/SCI Clearance.
I am a Business-First Software Engineer and I love solving business problems elegantly.

experience.title: Data Intern - JJ Kane
experience.description: Building long-term insights for internal customers such as Customer Solutions, Management and Sales.

experience.title: Safety Undergraduate Researcher - Engineering Safety
experience.description: Researched and directed the design, launch and maintenance of online safety tools for individual labs in the College of Engineering.

experience.title: Teaching Assistant - Univ of AL
experience.description: Assisted in teaching 250+ students in multiple languages including Python, JS, and C#.

experience.title: Information Technology Manager - Levy, Univ of AL
experience.description: Responsible for maintaining Point-of-Sale services for $5 Million+ of transactions per year with a team of 3 part-time workers.

experience.title: Founder, Principal Consultant - Signal Surge LLC
experience.description: Running an IT Consulting firm focused on providing technical solutions and services. Recently Launched WhoBrew, a tap-based Business Card service.

experience.title: Sergeant - 20th Special Forces Group
experience.description: Supporting Special Forces Intelligence Operations as a Collector, Analyst, and Leader.

education.description: University of Alabama, Management Information Systems
